Man, these look like radiation burns. I gotta get–

Juan wants to try Stress Relief, so Andrew rolls his stress pool and gets an 18.

Barry zips away. We see him grabbing things from various storefronts in the area.

Juan rolls Barry's d8 Glory "If you've got the stuff, you gotta show it off" + Barry's d6 Richard "Trustworthy agent" + Barry's d12 Super Speed + (spending a plot point) Barry's d12 Agile, and winds up with a measly 6. He drops a plot point to re-roll… and drops a 2 to a 1, so now he has a complication.

AGENT COULSON
Freeze!

INT. ORSON'S LIVING ROOM

EIRWYN
Where to start…
ORSON
Start with the truth and let's see where that gets us.

Sam wants Orson to provide the box. She rolls in Denali as aid, for +8. Then Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d6 Orson "could be one of us" + Eirwyn's d6 Yuan'ti Heritage for a total of 18.

EIRWYN
Do you still have the box?
ORSON
It's safe.
EIRWYN
(exasperated)
I'm sick of hiding, so… where were we?
ORSON
Prince. Mission.
EIRWYN
His name is Denali. I'm tracking down who killed his father.
ORSON
Prince of where?
EIRWYN
A place you've never heard of called Flux. He sent the package.
ORSON
Why did he send it to me?
EIRWYN
He thought this was my address.
ORSON
But it had my name on it.
EIRWYN
What? It– I need to see the box.

Morgan's still not ready to just hand it over, so he rolls Orson's d6 Off-Campus House for +4, plus Orson's d12 Truth "The truth is out there" + (challenged) Orson's d6 Eirwyn "I trust her, but should I?" + Orson's d8 Nibelung Heritage for a total of 26, with a complication.

ORSON
A prince named after an Alaskan mountain from a place that I don't know sent you to magically blow the lock off my door, for a package he sent to the wrong place?

As he mentions the package, he glances, for just a moment, at the closet.

EIRWYN
Yes. Because he's Prince of another planet, and you're connected to this, somehow.

Sam rolls Eirwyn's d10 Prince Denali for +7, and then Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d6 Orson "could be one of us" + Eirwyn's d6 Yuan'ti Heritage + (spending a plot point) her own d12 Exhausted + Orson's d4 Angry, for a 27, with a complication.

The closet beeps, then a whirring sound comes from within.

DENALI (VOICEOVER FROM FLASHBACK)
The device is a new type of scanner. It may be able to find agents of the Tenari Empire here on Earth.

Morgan takes the stress; it's a d12 for his Afraid.

ACT III

EXT. ALLEYWAY

Chava stops her car and hops out. Agent Coulson stands with his gun drawn, trained at Barry's back.

Seth wants to stop the violence before it begins. Trouble gets 19. Seth rolls Chava's d8 Power "The powerful need to be checked" + (challenged) Chava's d8 Richard "knows more than he reveals" + Chava's d10 Telepathy for 20.

Chava slowly approaches the agent.

CHAVA
Now, there's no need to get violent. We're here to help, agent. Let us do that much. We can sort out the other things later. Right now we have a bleeding man who needs medical attention.

Agent Coulson relaxes just a bit.

Juan wants to make sure that Coulson doesn't see him as a threat, either. Trouble gets 18, and Richard wants to aid Barry with Richard's d8 Duty "I make the hard choices for others" + Richard's d6 In Over Your Head + Richard's d10 Sam "is a lost soul" (because…) for +6.

RICHARD (DELIRIOUSLY MUTTERING)
Sam. Sam, don't do it. He's– No!

Juan rolls Barry's d8 Duty "I try to keep my promises" + Barry's d6 Richard "Trustworthy agent" + Barry's d8 Likeable for 12, and a plot point makes it 17, which is 23 with Richard's aid.

Coulson lowers his weapon. Chava and Barry spring into action, using the supplies Barry's already acquired.

Andrew once again rolls his stress pool of 2d12… and gets 24, because Andrew. Seth aids, rolling Chava's d8 Power "The powerful need to be checked" + Chava's d8 Richard "knows more than he reveals" + Chava's d8 Genius for a +6; Juan rolls Barry's d8 Glory "If you've got the stuff, you gotta show it off" + Barry's d10 Chava "Best friend" + Barry's d12 Super Speed for 18 on his own, and drops a plot point to bring the grand total to 27. That d12 Injured goes to Richard's growth pool.

Richard groans, gasps, and his eyes open. He sees Barry.

RICHARD
…hit… from behind… I can't feel my… Barry, go get help.
AGENT COULSON
Barry?!
CHAVA
Go call for an ambulance!

INT. ORSON'S LIVING ROOM

The two of them stand peering into the closet, where the beeping and whirring continue. Now we can see the lights flashing, too.

ORSON
Is it going to explode?
EIRWYN
I don't think so.
ORSON
Is it going to hurt us?
EIRWYN
I don't think so.

Orson steps back, puts a finger up, and goes to the kitchen. Eirwyn watches the box for a moment. Orson returns with a tea set and a binder, both of which he puts on the coffee table. The binder is the one from Germany, and it has a large swastika on the front.

Morgan attempts to do Stress Relief, so Sam rolls Eirwyn's pool and gets a 14. Morgan rolls Orson's d6 Off-Campus House for +5, and then Orson's d12 Truth "The truth is out there" + Orson's d6 Eirwyn "I trust her, but should I?" + Orson's d8 Nibelung Heritage for a total of 9 with three (!) complications.

ORSON
I was experimented on as a baby, at that bunker. They injected me with something that made me different, made me…

The story continues as we fade out.

Sam thinks that her listening should be Stress Relief, so Morgan rolls Orson's pool and gets a 9. Sam then rolls Eirwyn's d10 Truth "is freedom" + (challenged) Eirwyn's d6 Orson "could be one of us" + Eirwyn's d6 Yuan'ti Heritage for 12, so Orson's Afraid goes to the growth pool.

Tag Scenes

INT. FBI HEADQUARTERS

Chava sits attentively at Rob's desk.

CHAVA
You have a leak in your organization. I can help find it.

INT. HOSPITAL ROOM

RICHARD
Thank you. You had my back.

Richard attempts Stress Relief. Juan rolls Barry's pool and gets 4, which Andrew beats with a 16, so Barry's Afraid sinks into the growth pool.

INT. ORSON'S LIVING ROOM

Take out covers the coffee table. Orson is asking questions we don't hear and Eirwyn is answering. Orson looks up and sees his reflection in the mirror. It scowls, but he shakes his head and returns to the conversation.

Eirwyn's stress pool only gets a 2, and Morgan beats it into submission with a 14, so Eirwyn's Exhausted goes to growth.

Morgan attempts to increase his relationship with Eirwyn, and succeeds.

INT. HOSPITAL ROOM

It's dark out when Eirwyn arrives. Richard opens bleary eyes and sees her.

RICHARD
I killed an innocent man.

Now it's Sam doing Stress Relief. Andrew rolls Richard's stress pool and gets an 11; Sam rolls Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d8 Richard "Powerful ally" + Eirwyn's d6 Telepathy for (with a plot point) 15. Richard's d12 Insecure also heads to the growth pool.

EIRWYN
We all make mistakes. Sometimes big ones.

Richard rolls to pick up Cybernetic Heritage at d4.

INT. HOSPITAL

Barry sits in the waiting room, looking tired and spent. A voice breaks his solace.

ROB
Your country needs you, Barry West.

metadata.title: Meltdown
metadata.summary: Richard is tasked with finding the speedster, and goes to Chava to ask for advice. Eirwyn confronts Orson.

s02e03.data: The man who was killed at Mole Electronics, possibly by Axel.

s02e04.data:
ACT I

INT. HOSPITAL ROOM

We hear the operation happening before we see anything. There's the hum of machines and the beep of a heart monitor.

VOICE
There's extensive damage to the spinal column… never use these legs again… this left arm might not ever have the mobility…

A blurry scene fades in, first person from the bed. Rob and Sam stand in the background as the doctors do their work. The eyelids shut.

INT. UNIVERSITY HOUSE - JONAH'S STUDY

Ada is looking through paperwork, which covers every surface of the cluttered room. She's got a notebook open in front of her.

ADA
Why did Jonah never tell me about any of this?

We push in and see the notebook, catching the words "Denali" and "Flux", before seeing the photograph of Eirwyn that's been taped into the book.

Ada takes the picture out and examines it.

INT. DINGY FBI INTERROGATION ROOM

COULSON
I'm glad you've decided to join us, Mr. West. We could use someone of your skills. But if you're going to help your country, we can't have any more of this kind of incident.

He puts the familiar newspaper down, showing the fire truck and the blur, with the "Comics Become Real?" headline.

BARRY
That wasn't my fault! I was just trying to save my friends, and no one even got a good shot of me. I count that a win in my book.
COULSON
You panicked the authorities. They released the dogs on that crowd because of you.
BARRY
They were releasing those dogs anyway.
COULSON
You can't know that for sure. You can't protect people if you jump to conclusions, Mr. West.
BARRY
I was there; I saw what was going to happen. You might guess differently behind your safe desk.

Coulson stands.

COULSON
This is a bad idea. I can't recommend you for field work.

INT. HOSPITAL ROOM

Richard stirs. Around him, Eirwyn, Sam, and Bao rouse from whatever they had been distracting themselves with.

RICHARD
(groggily)
Hey, everybody. We at a funeral or something? Why the long faces?
EIRWYN
How are you feeling, Richard?
RICHARD
Like I could run a half-mile.

He smiles, but no one looks happy.

RICHARD
Did the doctors say anything? About when I should be out of here?
EIRWYN
A while.

Andrew wants some Richard to know what Eirwyn knows, so he rolls Richard's d8 Power "With great power comes great responsibility" + Richard's d6 Eirwyn "has earned my trust" + Richard's d10 Sam "is a lost soul" for a 10. Countered by Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d8 Richard "Powerful ally" for a 10; tie goes to the actor, so Andrew re-rolls his pool and hands a d8 Exhausted to Eirwyn.

RICHARD
It can't be that bad, right?

Eirwyn looks away.

SAM
Can you lift your left arm?

Richard smirks, but as he realizes that he cannot, panic spreads across his face.

RICHARD
I can't. I can't lift my–
SAM
(calmly)
What do you remember from the bank?

Richard glances over to Bao.

RICHARD
I was making… a deposit. I heard the door. I felt a pain in my back and then I'm here.
SAM
You were shot in the robbery.
RICHARD
Not the first time I've been shot. I figured.
SAM
It hit your spine. You've been paralyzed.
RICHARD
That's ridiculous. I…

He squirms, using his weight to change position. He gets frustrated and goes too fast, and almost tumbles out of bed.

Trouble gets 5. Eirwyn rolls Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d8 Richard "Powerful ally" + Eirwyn's d8 Telekinesis for 16.

Eirwyn rushes forward and catches him, then sits him up straight.

RICHARD
I–

He looks around at the women, unsure of himself.

INT. MARCUS' HOUSE

Orson enters, giving his coat to the butler. He strides down the hallway and hears voices. Marcus' and… Chava?

Morgan wants to eavesdrop, so he rolls Orson's d12 Truth "The truth is out there" + Orson's d10 Chava "Keep Your Friends Close…" + Orson's d6 Sneaky for 13. Marcus rolls Marcus's d6 Truth "It's best if lesser minds don't know" + Marcus's d8 Orson "Useful. Pity he's not that bright." + Marcus's d10 Big Brother for 15. Morgan won't give in, so he takes a d8 Afraid; he's not sure if he was heard or not.

MARCUS
You've heard the latest about Richard?
CHAVA
I have. And I'm worried about him, but it can't mean that the world stops.
MARCUS
A good way to look at it. Do you have any leads as to the attacker?
CHAVA
No, but I'm working that angle. It's someone who has it out for Barry, so it's likely one of the other two rad lab researchers, both of whom were presumed dead. When I know you'll know. Did your sources find out anything about the explosion at the rad lab? It's too suspicious to be an accident…
MARCUS
And I agree, as do my sources. No one knows what, exactly, went on that night, but no one is assuming an accident any more.

Chava waits, building up confidence before asking a favor.

CHAVA
Does… does Kriemhild have any resources that they can use to help Agent Smith?
MARCUS
Sam has already been investigating and pushing for this. There may be, but it is not a decision to make lightly.

Seth thinks Chava would push here, so he rolls Chava's d8 Power "The powerful need to be checked" (challenged) + Chava's d8 Richard "needs to stop being a good soldier" + Chava's d6 Marcus "is useful but dangerous", for a rather sad little 7, with a complication.

CHAVA
He's worth investing in. He's been a valuable asset in the past, and keeping him active is a smart play.

David rolls opposition: Marcus's d6 Truth "It's best if lesser minds don't know" + Marcus's d4 Richard "Some tools are expendable" + Marcus's d8 Manipulative for… 0. David rolled three 1s.

Marcus looks away, thinking. An image plays above him, a memory that Chava sees: a younger Marcus is sitting at a bedside in Nazi germany, a young blonde lady dying slowly before him. He holds her hand.

CHAVA
My skills are best suited for finding the perpetrator. And I do intend to find him. And when I know, you'll know. I'll endeavor to make that soon.

Marcus nods. Chava stands, and decides not to further break his concentration. She exits.

As the door shuts behind her we see that Orson was standing behind it. She doesn't notice him.

ORSON
Hi, Chava.

Chava jumps, startled, and tries not to scream.

CHAVA
(whispering)
Orson, what the hell?! Shh!

She looks back at the door, making sure she didn't alarm Marcus, then glances down the halls.

CHAVA
Come with me; there's not much time.

ACT II

INT. HOSPITAL

Barry enters.

RICHARD
Thank god. Tell me you brought scotch.

Barry nods, and hands over the bottle.

BARRY
Don't let the nurse see; she might not approve.
RICHARD
Come alone?
BARRY
Not exactly.

Rob enters.

RICHARD
What is it, Rob?
ROB
I can tell from your tone that the doctor's told you.
RICHARD
The doctor hasn't told me anything. The doctor is afraid of me. My sister told me.
ROB
Well, I'm sorry about that. The FBI tries to take care of their own.
RICHARD
And is there anything the FBI can do for me?
ROB
No. No, this is beyond what our best doctors can do right now. I wish it were otherwise.
RICHARD
I figured. I'd like to nap, now.

Rob nods, and turns to leave.

Juan wants to stick around. He rolls Barry's d8 Duty "I try to keep my promises" + Barry's d6 Richard "Trustworthy agent" + Barry's d8 Likeable for 10. Andrew counters with Richard's d8 Duty "I make the hard choices for others" + Richard's d6 Barry "is a mystery to be solved" (boosted with a plot point) + (dropping a plot point for a useful detail) d6 Scotch for 15.

BARRY
Don't be like that. Let me stay and keep you company.
RICHARD
No, Barry, I've got no one to blame but myself. I survived a war. Went hand to hand with korean infantry. Came back here and I survived a guy who shot fire from his hands. And then I got shot at a god damn bank. In the back. Like a coward. So if you'll excuse me, I'd like. to take. a nap.

Andrew rerolls his pool and adds a d8 Insecure to Barry's stress pool, and drops a plot point to Stress Out the speedster.

As Richard stares intently out the window, Barry stands up and shuffles out.

INT. EIRWYN'S HOUSE

Knocking. Eirwyn answers the door. Ada's outside, holding a notebook and Eirwyn's picture.

EIRWYN
Come in. Someone was going to figure it out eventually.

Ada enters, cautiously. She takes the proffered seat.

EIRWYN
Can I get you something to eat or drink?
ADA
I want to ask for something strong, but no, let's just talk.
EIRWYN
Suit yourself.

She picks up a half-empty bottle and pours herself a glass.

ADA
My husband is dead.

Eirwyn stops pouring.

ADA
And these notes lead me to believe that you're connected to that.

Eirwyn pours a double.

EIRWYN
I was not involved in his death, if that's what you're asking. But I'm pretty sure I know who killed him.
ADA
Who?

David rolls trouble; it gets 5. Sam rolls Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d4 Jonah "trusted confidant" + Eirwyn's d6 Yuan'ti Heritage for 7.

EIRWYN
Someone you don't know. I'm looking for him already.
ADA
Can I reconsider the drink?

Eirwyn nods, and stands to pour another. She hands it over.

ADA
I'm worried about Chava. She's been acting… weird… for well over a year.
EIRWYN
What do you mean?
ADA
It's little things, mostly, but also… she's been injured– really injured– multiple times. Once or twice you can play it off, but no one should get that hurt that regularly.
EIRWYN
I'm sure she's fine.
ADA
She is not fine.
EIRWYN
I can watch her for you.
ADA
I want to know what she's involved in. I want to know the truth.
EIRWYN
I can ask around. But honestly, I haven't really seen her in a long time. We're not as close as we were.
ADA
Whatever you can do, I would appreciate. Help her, please.

INT. KRIEG GARAGE

Chava and Orson have found a secluded spot to chat. They sit uncomfortably.

CHAVA
How much of that did you hear? I'm not asking to cover up anything; I need to know where to start so we can be quick.
ORSON
The world doesn't stop.
CHAVA
Right. It doesn't. It keeps plowing on no matter how much I'd like it to slow down. I've been working for your father. Little jobs, fact finding stuff. Trying to find out– trying to prove what we suspected.
ORSON
And?
CHAVA
And it's all true. Richard does work for the FBI. Your father does do secret research for the government's Kriemhild project. Sam does all the dirty work we feared. And I had to keep it all from you because he made me promise not to tell you. It hurt to do it, and I'm sorry.
ORSON
So if Richard is a danger… do we have to kill him?
CHAVA
What? No! No, I'm trying to get him out.
ORSON
And my father?
CHAVA
Your father, I'm afraid, is going to be with us for some time. He's mired deep in all of this, and we'll have no hope of untangling it if he's not in the center to guide us.
ORSON
But–

Seth tries some Stress Relief; Orson's pool gets 7, while Chava's d12 Truth "No one keeps secrets from me" + Chava's d8 Orson "needs to be pushed to reach his potential" + Chava's d10 Telepathy gets 16.

CHAVA
We'll manage. We'll figure it out. These are institutions build of shadows, and we can hide inside as we dismantle them. We're good at that.
ORSON
Ok. Ok. My turn. How much do you really know about your friend Eirwyn?

ACT III

INT. HOSPITAL HALL

Determined steps as Marcus walks the hall; Orson follows.

ORSON
How do you know Richard, dad?

Morgan wants a bit of truth here, so rolls Orson's d12 Truth "The truth is out there" + Orson's d6 Marcus "When the wind is southerly" + Orson's d6 Sneaky for… 6. Marcus doesn't want to give up anything, so rolls Marcus's d10 Power "Knowlege is power" + Marcus's d8 Orson "Useful. Pity he's not that bright." + Marcus's d8 Manipulative for 14.

MARCUS
He's done work for me before. A few times. His sister recommended him. He's also your friend, and you should pay your condolences.

David re-rolls the pool and tosses a d10 Angry into Orson's stress pool: Orson never gets the upper hand in this relationship.

ORSON
OK. Work. What kind of work?

Another tack another roll. Orson's d12 Truth "The truth is out there" + Orson's d6 Marcus "When the wind is southerly" + Orson's d6 Sneaky + (spending a plot point) Orson's d6 Richard "Every rose has its thorn" for 10.

Marcus inhales sharply. He stands with his hand on the door to the hospital room, blocking the way.

David pulls out the big guns. Marcus's d12 Nibelung + Orson's d10 Angry + Marcus's d6 Truth "It's best if lesser minds don't know" + Marcus's d8 Orson "Useful. Pity he's not that bright." + Marcus's d8 Mastermind for 19.

MARCUS
At this point, son, there are some things you are not qualified to know. This is one of them.

David rerolls the pool and hands over a d12 Exhausted.

He enters.

Richard is in bed, still staring out the window. The bottle of scotch sits on the bedside, nearly empty. Marcus waits for a moment, but when he senses no greeting is forthcoming he begins.

MARCUS
Richard, I've come to talk to you. I've been informed of your situation. And there are people who might be able to help. But it would require a considerable expense.
RICHARD
And you're wondering if I'm worth it.
MARCUS
Yes.

Richard picks up the bottle, puts the cork in it.

RICHARD
It's been a long day, Mr. Krieg.

Orson steps forward. He pokes at Richard's leg.

Morgan wants Richard to come clean, so he rolls Orson's d12 Truth "The truth is out there" + Orson's d6 Richard "Every rose has its thorn" + Orson's d6 Vicious + his own d10 Angry, for 12.

ORSON
Making a deposit? Really?

Andrew doesn't care, and has Richard give in.

RICHARD
No. I was an FBI agent, and I got shot by a super powered menace to society while investigating super powered people.
ORSON
Apparently you were not a very good agent?

Andrew isn't gonna let that slide. With intent to hurt, he rolls Richard's d4 Glory "No glory for the grunt" + (challenged) Richard's d10 Orson "is more than meets the eye" + his d6 Scotch + Orson's d12 Exhausted, for a 24. Morgan repostes with Orson's d10 Justice "The weed of crime bears bitter fruit" + Orson's d6 Richard "Every rose has its thorn" + Orson's d6 Vicious + his own d10 Angry, but comes up with a mere 7, with a complication.

RICHARD
What happened to us? We used to be friends. We hung out. Had fun. And I never mentioned all the shady shit you did. Didn't mention it to your father. Didn't mention it to the FBI. And you come in here on this shitty day and you pull this? Well, fuck you, Orson. Fuck you.
ORSON
What happened to me? I found out that my friend was an FBI agent who'd been lying to me for years.

Orson storms out.

MARCUS
Yes. Back to important matters.

INT. FBI HEADQUARTERS

ROB
I need an honest answer. How long has Richard known about your powers?

Trouble has 14. Juan rolls Barry's d8 Truth "Not everyone needs to hear the truth" + b.rob + Barry's d8 Smartass + (spending a plot point) Barry's d8 Likeable, but comes up with just a 9.

Barry opens his mouth to speak, then thinks better of it. He smiles nervously.

ROB
You know you're not helping Richard or yourself right now.
BARRY
It's not his fault. He was trying to protect me. He's a good guy!
ROB
Believe me, Barry, I know that he's a good guy. I know. But perhaps the job we've given to him was not one he was qualified to do.

INT. ADA'S DINNER TABLE

Eirwyn and Chava are eating with Ada.

EIRWYN
I love this sauce, Mrs. Meyer. Thank you for inviting me tonight.
CHAVA
It's been so long since I've seen anyone. Have you seen Orson, lately?
EIRWYN
Yes, rather a lot. There was a mixup and my cousin sent a package to his house by mistake.
CHAVA
One of your cousins from Italy?
EIRWYN
Yes, but he lives further inland than my family.

Seth wants to catch Eirwyn in her lies, so rolls Chava's d12 Truth "No one keeps secrets from me" + (challenged) Chava's d6 Eirwyn "must be protected from this craziness" + Chava's d10 Telepathy for 15. Sam doesn't want to get caught, so rolls Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + (challenged) Eirwyn's d8 Chava "I left her to help the crown" + Eirwyn's d6 Telepathy for 13, plus a plot point brings it to 18, but still with a complication.

Chava peers to see Eirwyn's memories, but instead she gets nothing. She blinks, unused to this. Is Eirwyn blocking her?

Sam rerolls her pool and hands a d8 Insecure to Chava.

CHAVA
It's been too long since we did this, right? Too long away from each other, since we caught up.

Seth tries Stress Relief; Eirwyn's pool has 10. Chava's d6 Duty "My parents sacrificed to give me this opportunity" + Chava's d6 Eirwyn "must be protected from this craziness" + Chava's d8 On a Mission gets 12. Eirwyn's Exhausted sinks into her growth pool.

CHAVA
So let's make this a standing date. Let's get the three of us together and catch up. Every week?
EIRWYN
Yeah. I'd like that.

INT. FBI HEADQUARTERS

Eirwyn is in Rob's office.

ROB
The 323-8. How do you know about that?

Trouble has 9. Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d8 Richard "Powerful ally" + Eirwyn's d8 Sneaky gets 9, and a plot point brings it to 14.

EIRWYN
I was paired with one of your agents for months. I followed him on missions, I aided him in his duties as he did mine. Did you expect me to learn nothing in that time?
ROB
OK. But you do understand you have no authority to use that code?

Trouble has 13. Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d8 Richard "Powerful ally" + Eirwyn's d8 Sneaky has 17.

EIRWYN
But would you rather the police were in posessession of that alien box, or that you let me use your code?
ROB
Alien box?
EIRWYN
The box Denali sent me.
ROB
I have no record of this. Was it cleared?

INT. HOSPITAL ROOM

Sam and Marcus stand at the foot of the bed.

MARCUS
The FBI can't help. But our organization can.

Sam is smiling in spite of herself.

MARCUS
But as much as I'd like to, this cannot be done out of the goodness of our hearts. You'll be exposed to highly classified information.
SAM
We're doing great things, little brother. You'll see. We can help you recover and you can help us accomplish… great things.

David wants Sam to convince her brother to join up, so he rolls sam.duty + (challenged) sam.r + sam.big-sister + sam.manipulative for a total of 16. Andrew counters with Richard's d12 Justice "I am the scales of justice" + Richard's d10 Sam "is a lost soul" + Richard's d8 Power "With great power comes great responsibility" for 10.

RICHARD
What about Timothy Simmons? How do I know I'm not just the next experiment?
SAM
There are things you don't know about that situation. And others. When you're in, you'll be able to see the truth.
RICHARD
And if I don't like the truth? I want a way out. I was assurances.
MARCUS
Fine.
SAM
It'll be better. You'll see.
RICHARD
Alright. Alright, I'm in.

TAGS

EXT. STREET

A blur stops, and Barry pulls the student ID from his pocket.

BARRY
Claudia, where are you?

He speeds away.

INT. EIRWYN'S HOUSE

Eirwyn drinks a scotch.

Sam wants to increase Eirwyn's relationship with Richard. Target is set at 6; she gets an 11, and up it goes.

INT. HOSPITAL ROOM

Chava intercepts the duty nurse as she leaves the room. We see the memories of all the people coming and going around her head as Chava smiles and makes small talk we don't see. Chava enters, notes that Richard is asleep, and sets about tidying up. She replaces the old flowers with a new bunch– and as she touches the vase we hear a snippet of conversation from earlier. She shifts a chair back to make room- and we see Barry standing from it after being told off. She smooths out the bedsheet– and we see Marcus and Sam looming over Richard. She slumps into the chair next to the bed and puts her head down on Richard's side. She cries softly.

Seth wants to increase Chava's relationship with Richard, but David rolls an 18 as the target. Chava's pool manages a 17, so she steps back her relationship with Bao. She also rewrites some statements: Richard "is trapped by his past mistakes," while the "Powerful hold too tightly to their toys" and Eirwyn "should have told me the truth".

Richard stirs. He notices Chava, squeezes her, and a tear runs down his face. He loses it, and the tears suddenly gush forth.

RICHARD
I think I sold my soul to the devil today.

metadata.title: Cages
metadata.summary: Everyone visits Richard in the hospital.

s02e05.data:
ACT I

INT. SLOT MACHINES AT THE TROPICANA

In Las Vegas, Bao wins at slots as Richard, Orson, and Chava look on.

Establishing shots of various kitchy neon, waitresses, and gambling floors. We're in Las Vegas in the glamorous, seedy 60s. We see Bao, sporting a ridiculous birthday hat and nursing a drink, happily pulling the arm of a slot machine. Chava and Orson are manning machines nearby; Richard is watching over Chava's shoulder. Bao pulls and we see three sevens line up. As she yells in surprise, a woman approaches Richard.

DIANA
Help me please. They're after me.

INT. TROPICANA HOTEL HALLWAY

Barry hears a gunshot, and when he runs to investigate he finds Eirwyn standing over a body; he escapes with her but is seen by the security guards.

Barry exits his room and walks a few paces down the hall when a gunshot rings out. He blurs into action, bursting into a nearby room. He sees a body on the floor, blood stain soaking the carpet, and Eirwyn standing above, looking at him in shock.

EIRWYN
How are you-?!

Barry zooms forward, lifts her up, and turns around to see a security guard looking in the door.

David rolls trouble and get 5. Juan rolls Barry's d8 Glory "If you've got the stuff, you gotta show it off" + Barry's d4 Eirwyn "Cool co-worker" + Barry's d12 Agile for 10, but he grabs a complication.

Barry runs forward and twists by the guard, but being forced to slow down means the guard sees his face. Barry just keeps going, and the guard is standing there, dumbfounded.

INT. SLOT MACHINES AT THE TROPICANA

Diana asks for help hiding from the mobsters who run the casino.

RICHARD
Who's following you?

Orson, suddenly standing next to them, gestures to two goons hurrying through the floor.

ORSON
Mobsters.
RICHARD
Are you in danger?
DIANA
Yes.
RICHARD
Are we in danger?
DIANA
Yes.

The goons are getting closer.

RICHARD
Do you trust me?
DIANA
Yes?

David rolls trouble; he's got 8. Morgan aids with Orson's d8 Sneaky for +3, while Andrew rolls Richard's d8 Duty "I make the hard choices for others" + Richard's d10 Orson "is out of touch with reality" + Richard's d8 Super Senses + (a useful detail, bought with a plot point) his d6 Hat, for 15 with the aid.

As Orson cheers on Bao, Richard dips Diana and kisses her. The guards walk past. When they stand again, Diana is blushing.

RICHARD
Come on Chava, we've got to run.
CHAVA
(still engrossed in her slot machine; she's not heard a word)
What?

INT. BARRY'S HOTEL ROOM

Eirwyn claims innocence, but security is chasing her, so she and Barry jump out the window.

Shot of the empty room, and then suddenly Barry and Eirwyn are inside, Barry watching out the peephole. He bolts the door.

BARRY
They got a look at me, so we don't have much time. Tell me what's going on.
EIRWYN
Yeah, exactly! Tell me what's going on!
BARRY
I saw you in front of a dead man! Did you shoot him?
EIRWYN
No. How did you move that fast?
BARRY
I–

A rough knock at the door.

SECURITY (FROM OUTSIDE)
Security! Open up!

Eirwyn looks around; there are no other doors. She runs to the window and looks down the two stories, then climbs out.

David's trouble pool has all 1s, so he has 0. Sam rolls Eirwyn's d6 Glory "I work in the shadows" + Eirwyn's d4 Barry "old coworker" + Eirwyn's d8 Telekinesis and get 9, with a complication.

Eirwyn jumps, slowing her fall before she lands softly on the ground.

Barry runs from the door as it crunches inward. He also leaps out the window.

Trouble has 9; Juan rolls Barry's d8 Glory "If you've got the stuff, you gotta show it off" + Barry's d4 Eirwyn "Cool co-worker" + Barry's d12 Super Speed + Barry's d12 Agile for 15, with a complication.

Barry lands next to Eirwyn. They look around, and notice that they're on stage with an audience watching.

INT. BACK ROOM

Diana explains that she wants to turn state's evidence on the Gambino family. Chava sees her memories and figures that she's trying to trick them.

DIANA
Diana Sutton. The people who followed me are from the Gambino family.
RICHARD
And how did you get involved with such dangerous people, Diana?
DIANA
I work financials, and I was handed some files I shouldn't have seen, about a deal with the Augustine family.
ORSON
Well too bad you didn't hit up Richard here before he was put out to pasture. Then he could have used his FBI credentials to help out and never tell the rest of us.

Orson's stress pool rolls 12. Seth aids with Chava's d8 Orson "needs to be pushed to reach his potential" for +8; Andrew rolls Richard's d8 Power "With great power comes great responsibility" + Richard's d10 Orson "is out of touch with reality" + Richard's d6 Heroic Reputation for an aided total of 20. Orson's Insecure drops into his growth pool.

CHAVA
Orson, enough. We've all kept secrets. Sometimes for very good reasons, and sometimes not. But we can't begrudge each other some privacy in our dealings.
RICHARD
I was just doing my job. I was not always the best at it, but I tried to help. And I downplayed evidence about your secrets, so don't get too self-righteous. You helped me out, and I helped you out, and I hope we can all work together now to help Diana out.
CHAVA
Which authority covers organized crime cases?
RICHARD
Federal. But I'm on medical leave.
CHAVA
So we call in and grab some backup.

EXT. STAGE SHOW

Barry and Eirwyn escape the stage they landed on.

A dancer grabs Eirwyn and twirls her around as Bellafonte's Jump in the Line plays. Two stories above, we see mobsters leaning out the window.

David rolls trouble and has 12. Juan aids with Barry's d12 Agile for +4; Sam rolls Eirwyn's d6 Glory "I work in the shadows" + Richard's d6 Barry "is a mystery to be solved" + Eirwyn's d8 Sneaky for an aided total of 9, but a plot point an a sneaky-based reroll makes that a 16.

Barry leaps to the front and does a flip while Eirwyn disengages and leaves out the back. Barry then spins off after her.

ACT II

INT. RICHARD'S HOTEL ROOM

Richard calls Rob for help with Diana, but Rob instead asks for help with Barry, who now has an APB out for him. Richard deputizes Chava and Orson before Barry and Eirwyn arrive to proclaim their innocence. Bao arrives and Orson panics, pulling a gun on her and requiring the others to talk him down. Bao angrily demands the truth from Richard, who does not provide it. Chava takes all the women downstairs for drinks.

Richard is on the phone. Diana and Chava sit on one bed, and Orson sits on the other.

RICHARD (INTO PHONE)
Yeah, I'll hold.

The screen splits as Rob answers the other end.

ROB (ON PHONE)
Richard; glad you called. We have a problem. The Las Vegas PD has a call out for Barry West, wanted for questioning in a murder investigation of radar operator Gary Wilkinson. I don't know what kind of trouble that kid's in this time, but you need to bring him in.
RICHARD
And what if he won't comply?
ROB
Just… try, Agent Smith.
RICHARD
I will. But I've also got an incident.
ROB
(sighing)
What now?
RICHARD
I have an informant on the Gambinos here with me. She fell into my lap.
ROB
Are you kidding?
RICHARD
Nope. Do I extract her or stay and wait for help?
ROB
Well, let me-

The camera shifts to Chava, who is chatting with Diana.

DIANA
And that's when I got the paperwork, see?

Seth drops a plot point to activate Chava's memory-reading.

Diana's memories appear around her head. We see her receive the papers from a man in an ill-fitting suit.

GAMBINO (IN MEMORY)
Now this is important, Di: make sure someone is there to take the fall.

The memory skips forward, and we see Diana standing on a platform overlooking the busy gambling floor. She points to Richard, and when she speaks her voice is not the scared victim we've heard before; she's in charge.

DIANA (IN MEMORY)
That's the mark. Give me 2 minutes head start then come down looking ferocious.

We snap out of the memory as Richard clicks the receiver back onto the phone set.

RICHARD
So it looks like I have to deputize you two. We've got Diana here to protect, and a certain speed demon is in trouble.
CHAVA
(trying too hard not to look at Diana)
When is he ever out of it?

Bao walks into the room.

BAO
Was I abandoned by my friends on my birthday?

Orson draws a pistol. He points it at Bao, who stops dead in her tracks.

CHAVA
Whoa, whoa! Orson, put the gun down. It's just Bao. We're here with Bao.

Orson's stress pool rolls 12. Andrew aids with Richard's d10 Orson "is out of touch with reality" for +5; Seth rolls Chava's d8 Orson "needs to be pushed to reach his potential" + Chava's d10 Telepathy for a sad 4, and the 9 total is not enough to help.

BAO
What the fuck, Orson? What the fuck does Richard have you doing now?

David rolls Bao's d10 Power "My teeth and ambitions are bared… be prepared!" + Bao's d6 Orson "Why won't he notice me?" + Bao's d8 Willful + Bao's d8 Embassy for 19. Morgan counters with Orson's d4 Love "Why does everybody want to kick my ass?" + Orson's d4 Barry "is one of dad's minions" + Orson's d8 Sneaky, coming up with a puny 6. David rolls for stress and hands a d8 to Orson's Afraid.

Orson lowers the gun.

ORSON
I- I've had one too many.

The door opens again, and Barry and Eirwyn enter. The room is now beyond crowded.

Bao turns on Richard.

BAO
I'm not an idiot. I can see it's more than that. I can see that you're lying. That's what you do; lie to me and everyone else that cares about you. Because you don't care about them; you're just doing your duty, and are happy to overrule other people's feelings for your own ends.

David rolls Bao's d10 Power "My teeth and ambitions are bared… be prepared!" + Bao's d4 Richard "It was fun while it lasted" + Bao's d8 Willful + Barry's d6 Exhausted + Bao's d8 Embassy for 19. Juan aids with his plot-point acquired d6 Bao relationship, which rolls +6. Andrew rolls Richard's d4 Truth "The truth in the wrong hands" + Richard's d8 Bao "as cold as ice" + Richard's d6 Heroic Reputation, and the total is 17. David re-rolls and hands over a d10 for Richard's Angry.

CHAVA
You're right, Bao. He's a liar. Now come with me and let's go get birthday drinks.

She grabs Diana and Eirwyn and ushers them outside. Bao fumes for a moment, then follows.

ACT III

INT. TROPICANA HOTEL HALLWAY

Bao asks Chava what the hell is going on; Chava tells her about Diana running from the mob.

The girls are walking down the stairwell. Bao slows a bit and grabs Chava's arm.

BAO
Richard's lying, Orson's lying. What the hell is really going on?

David wants Bao to get answers, so he rolls Bao's d4 Truth "I don't like being lied to" + Bao's d8 Chava "We help each other achieve our wishes" + Bao's d8 Willful for 13. Seth gives in.

CHAVA
Diana's on the run from the mob. Richard is trying to help her. Right now she needs to relax, and you can help her do that, but we can't do it in that room with that many people. It's exciting, right?

Bao's eyes are wide. A grin breaks across her face.

BAO
The mob!

Chava shushes her, sharing a smile.

CHAVA
The mob. Now let's go before they notice we're lagging behind.

INT. RICHARD'S HOTEL ROOM

Richard yells at Orson, then at Barry.

RICHARD
Orson! What. the. fuck.
ORSON
I was deputized!
RICHARD
And you became an idiot?

Richard wants to make Orson feed bad about what he did, so Andrew rolls Richard's d8 Power "With great power comes great responsibility" + Richard's d10 Orson "is out of touch with reality" + Richard's d6 Barry "is a mystery to be solved" + Orson's d10 Exhausted for 19. Morgan counters with Orson's d12 Truth "The truth is out there" + Orson's d6 Richard "Every rose has its thorn" + Orson's d6 Vicious + Richard's d10 Angry + his own d8 Angry for a 19, with a reroll to bring it to 26.

ORSON
You deputized me.

Andrew doesn't want to escalate, so Morgan re-rolls and hands over a d10 for Richard's Exhausted.

Richard hangs his head and sits hard on the bed. Barry sits next to Orson.

BARRY
I need to talk to this guy alone. Can we have the room, please?

Juan rolls Barry's d8 Truth "Not everyone needs to hear the truth" + Barry's d6 Richard "Trustworthy agent" + Barry's d8 Smartass + Orson's d10 Exhausted for 17. Morgan gives in.

Orson nods for a moment without moving, then stands.

ORSON
At least he said please.

He walks out and the camera follows him. He leaves the door slightly ajar. We hear the voices from inside as Orson walks away down the hall.

RICHARD
And you, Barry. Running around like a blur in public. What, are you trying to impress the girls, or something? And now you're wanted for murder?
BARRY
I'm not wanted for murder!

Two security guards enter the frame and flank the door.

INT. TROPICANA BAR

Eirwyn reads Diana's mind to know that it's a setup.

Eirwyn and Diana are at a corner table; Chava and Bao are getting drinks from the bartender.

DIANA
You certainly have an… interesting group of friends.
EIRWYN
I certainly do. And your friends?
DIANA
They know nothing about this.
EIRWYN
And what exactly is "this"?
DIANA
Right, you weren't there for that… I…

She looks around and lowers her voice.

DIANA
I saw some financial records I was not supposed to see, and now the Gambinos are after me. Your FBI friend is helping me get out of town.

Sam wants to know that she's lying. David rolls a 6 for trouble. Sam rolls Eirwyn's d10 Truth "is freedom" + Eirwyn's d8 Chava "doesn't need to know everything" + Eirwyn's d6 Telepathy for a 10.

DIANA (VOICEOVER)
This story is running awfully thin. Where the hell are Johnny and Jack? This lady should be in a cell already and instead I'm improvising…
EIRWYN
Yeah, we'll help you out.

INT. RICHARD'S HOTEL ROOM

Barry recounts the events of the night; Richard asks if Eirwyn did it, and Barry can't answer. But then security bursts in.

RICHARD
Murder? We've been here two hours.
BARRY
I heard a gunshot and ran to help. Eirwyn was there, and a body. I got her and ran, but security saw my face, and we've been dodging them ever since.
RICHARD
Well thanks for getting her out of there, but… did she kill him?
BARRY
She said… I'm not sure.

Barry's stress pool rolls 7. Andrew rolls Richard's d4 Glory "No glory for the grunt" + Richard's d6 Barry "is a mystery to be solved" + Richard's d8 Soldier for 13, and into the growth pool goes Barry's Insecure.

RICHARD
You're doing fine, West. We'll get clear of this yet.

The door bursts in and the security guards enter.

Trouble has 13… no, make it 17. Andrew aids with Richard's d12 Justice "I am the scales of justice" + Richard's d6 Barry "is a mystery to be solved" + Richard's d8 Super Senses + Richard's d10 Marksman for a +6. Juan takes the lead with Barry's d8 Glory "If you've got the stuff, you gotta show it off" + Barry's d6 Richard "Trustworthy agent" + Barry's d12 Super Speed + Barry's d12 Agile for 9… no, plot point says 12 for a grant total of 18.

Richard pulls his gun and Barry zips around. The chaos is quick but the goons end up on the ground.

INT. TROPICANA BAR

Chava sees an invisible Orson drinking and tells him to calm down.

Bao is raising a toast with Eirwyn and Diana. Chava is approaching with another round, but stops at an empty table, where a glass is raising itself. She slides in.

CHAVA
Orson, you need to cool off. You're mad at everyone and everything, lately. You're pushing away the people you need to help you, and you're just making it impossible for us to help. It's been a hard time lately– for all of us– but we haven't been giving each other the slack we need. Try slowing down a bit. Take a break.

Orson's stress pool gets 11. Seth rolls Chava's d6 Power "The powerful hold too tightly to their toys" + Chava's d8 Orson "needs to be pushed to reach his potential" + Chava's d10 Richard "is trapped by his past mistakes" + Chava's d10 Telepathy for 13, and Orson's Exhausted goes to his growth pool.

INT. TROPICANA BAR RESTROOM

The bartender hits on Eirwyn while Diana sneaks out.

Eirwyn peeks her head in, sees no one, and ushers Diana inside.

EIRWYN
Coast is clear.

Diana picks a stall. Eirwyn stands by the sink and looks into the mirror. A woman enters; it's the bartender. She sidles up next to Eirwyn and inspects herself.

BARTENDER
(lasciviously)
Wow, that hair. How do you keep it looking like that?
EIRWYN
I'm an alien; it comes naturally.

The bartender laughs.

David notes that Diana is trying to sneak out, and rolls trouble to get 14… no, 19. Seth notes that Chava's outside, so aids with Chava's d12 Truth "No one keeps secrets from me" + Chava's d10 Richard "is trapped by his past mistakes" for a +10; Sam rolls Eirwyn's d10 Duty "Whatever it takes" + Eirwyn's d8 Chava "doesn't need to know everything" + Eirwyn's d6 Telepathy for a 7, or a 17 total: trouble wins.

As Eirwyn is smiling at her admirer, Diana slips outside.

INT. TROPICANA BAR

Chava sees Diana making a break for it, and tells Orson to follow.

Diana turns so as not to pass the groups' table, but Chava is still at Orson's table and notices.

CHAVA
Orson! Diana's making a break for it! Follow her!

The glass sets itself down. Chava runs the other direction, up the stairs.

INT. TROPICANA FRONT DESK

Diana sends security up to Richard's room.

Diana approaches a security desk.

DIANA
Bill, the killer is in room 2319!

Bill picks up a phone.

INT. TROPICANA HOTEL HALLWAY

Everyone beats up mobsters. Richard wants to leave without Eirwyn; is talked out of it. They get her and go.

David's giant trouble pool rolls 12… no, 16… no, 22.

Richard and Barry exit their room to find two more security guards running toward them. Barry runs at them.

Juan aids with Barry's d8 Glory "If you've got the stuff, you gotta show it off" + Barry's d10 Chava "Best friend" + Barry's d12 Super Speed for a +10.

Richard turns a corner and finds another one, and a fistfight ensues.

Andrew aids with Richard's d12 Justice "I am the scales of justice" + Richard's d12 Chava "is as stubborn as a mule" + Richard's d8 Super Senses for a +9.

Downstairs, Bill enters a stairwell and bounds up to join the fray, but he's knocked down by an invisible force.

Morgan aids with Orson's d10 Justice "The weed of crime bears bitter fruit" + Orson's d10 Chava "Keep Your Friends Close…" + Orson's d8 Invisible for a +6.

Chava enters the hallway and sees the fray. She closes her eyes and inhales sharply. The mafia goons all hesitate a moment, and each is knocked down by a well-timed hit from his opponent.

CHAVA
Everybody! This way! Diana's trying to frame us!

Seth rolls Chava's d6 Power "The powerful hold too tightly to their toys" + Chava's d10 Richard "is trapped by his past mistakes" + Chava's d10 Telepathy for a 12, bringing the total in at 37.

Barry and Richard follow her, and as they go they find Orson standing above Bill in the stairwell.

CHAVA
We just need to swing by the bar for Eirwyn and Bao.
RICHARD
Eirwyn's a smart girl; she can take care of herself.
CHAVA
Are you crazy? We're not leaving them!

Andrew rolls Richard's d8 Duty "I make the hard choices for others" + Richard's d12 Chava "is as stubborn as a mule" + Richard's d6 Eirwyn "has earned my trust" + Richard's d8 Soldier for 18. Orson aids for +8; Barry with +4. Seth rolls Chava's d6 Power "The powerful hold too tightly to their toys" + Chava's d10 Richard "is trapped by his past mistakes" + Richard's d10 Angry, for a total of 22.

CHAVA
It's Bao's birthday.

Richard's stress pool rolls 8. Chava rolls stuff and gets 12, which banishes Richard's Exhausted to the growth pool.

RICHARD
Fine; I'll get the car and you get the girls.

TAGS

EXT. ROAD

Chava is in the car at the wheel, driving through the darkness. Richard is beside her; the others are asleep in the back.

CHAVA
You know, we can’t even do a proper vacation. Trouble seems to follow us around. You think it’s us…

She nods backward at the passengers, and smiles conspiratorially.

CHAVA
…or one of them?

metadata.title: Roll of the Dice
metadata.summary: On a trip to Las Vegas, Eirwyn is framed by mobsters and everyone bands together to get her out of trouble.

s02e05.data: A mob-connected woman from Las Vegas who tried to trick Richard, Orson, and Chava into helping her "escape" the Gambino family, when she in fact worked for the Gambinos. Her ultimate goal was never uncovered.
A radar operator who was murdered in Las Vegas by the Gambino family, who tried to frame Eirwyn for the crime. The true killer and motive for the killing were never uncovered.
A hotel in Las Vegas, connected to the Gambino crime family.
